name: The Immithar Expedition
description:
Thanks for checking out my game! This is my first game and first submission to a game jam! I had a lot of fun testing my abilities and coming up with something to fit the theme. 

The Immithar Expedition

Explore the galaxy by click on the planets and ships you'd like to visit. Use warps to travel to new systems, shown below: The black hole, and 4 suns are all visit-able.
